title: Algorithmic Bias Audit Framework
description: A comprehensive auditing protocol designed for Tier-1 financial institutions to detect and mitigate bias in credit scoring algorithms, ensuring compliance with the EU AI Act.

title: Sovereign AI Infrastructure
description: Strategic advisory for a public sector entity on establishing sovereign data centers and localized LLM deployment to prevent data leakage.

title: Automated Compliance Sentinel
description: Development of a real-time monitoring agent that flags non-compliant generative AI outputs against internal corporate policy.

title: Deepfake Detection Grid
description: Collaborative research project aimed at creating a decentralized verification layer for media authenticity in high-stakes environments.
